```{r}
load_and_inspect <- function(file_path) {
  data <- read_csv(file_path)
  cat("--- Data Loaded Successfully ---\n")
  glimpse(data)
  head(data)
  return(data)
}

emperors <- load_and_inspect("emperors.csv")

find_assassinated <- function(data) {
  data %>% filter(killer == "Assassination")
}

report_assassinations <- function(data, killer_type) {
  filtered <- data %>% filter(killer == killer_type)
  cat("-------- Report --------\n")
  cat("Deaths by:", killer_type, "\n")
  cat("Count:", nrow(filtered), "\n")
  cat("------------------------\n\n")
}

find_assassinated(emperors)
report_assassinations(emperors, "Assassination")
```
